title: Lauren Sheppard on LinkedIn: Flying the flag for B-cell cancer vaccines!   It's always such a...
author: Lauren Sheppard
description: Flying the flag for B-cell cancer vaccines!   It's always such a pleasure to work with Dr Pravin Kaumaya, can't wait to hear updates in development of the...
cleaned_text: Terrapinn Flying the flag for B-cell cancer vaccines! It's always such a pleasure to work with Dr [Pravin Kaumaya](https://www.linkedin.com/in/pravin-kaumaya-95306011?trk=public_post-text), can't wait to hear updates in development of the combination vaccines (PD-1, PD-L1, CTLA-4, TIGIT, LAG3) he is working on at the west coast edition of [The World Vaccine Congress](https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-world-vaccine-congress?trk=public_post-text) at the end of November. Early-bird offer ends July 28 - [https://lnkd.in/eu_KHRVN](https://lnkd.in/eu_KHRVN?trk=public_post-text) [](https://uk.linkedin.com/in/charlotte-kilpatrick-794b15141?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image) Editor at The World Vaccine Congress It may not be Thursday but here at [The World Vaccine Congress](https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-world-vaccine-congress?trk=public_post_reshare-text) we love a good [#throwback](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fthrowback&trk=public_post_reshare-text)! Today we are delighted to share this interview from [#wvcusa](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwvcusa&trk=public_post_reshare-text) with Dr [Pravin Kaumaya](https://www.linkedin.com/in/pravin-kaumaya-95306011?trk=public_post_reshare-text), [The Ohio State University](https://www.linkedin.com/school/the-ohio-state-university/?trk=public_post_reshare-text) [OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY WEXNER MEDICAL](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ohio-state-university-wexner-medical?trk=public_post_reshare-text). Hear from him about his work on [#cancer](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fcancer&trk=public_post_reshare-text) vaccines and how [#vaccination](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fvaccination&trk=public_post_reshare-text) is a "very
